|wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2055;BCM2055KFBG, HP0839 P20, 894203 R1; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325F;BCM5325FKQMG, RS0851 P11, 904953 1A; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2528L;;2; |flags= |stock_boot=CFE;1.0.37;BCM947XX; |stock_os=Linux;2.4.20; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=NETGEAR |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:1B:2F, 00:1E:2A, 00:1F:33, 00:22:3F, 00:24:B2 |oui_eth=00:1B:2F, 00:1E:2A, 00:1F:33, 00:22:3F, 00:24:B2 }} {{TagLine|RangeMax NEXT Wireless-N Router}} {{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WNR834Bv2|vs_id=2617}} "U12H081", "REV. 3 GP", and "800063" is silkscreened on one production model WN834Bv2. ==Additional external links== ===Wikis=== *{{TechInfoDepot|Netgear_WNR834B_v2}} *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wnr834b On '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] ===Forums=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=79498 Part numbers noted the '''DD-WRT''' forums] ===Serial=== ====Pinout==== This is a common ''Netgear'' / ''Foxconn'' pinout.. 
 1         JP1
(3.3v) (RxD) (NC)  (NC)  (TxD)  (GND)
